item.description:
I have made reservations for 5:30pm at India Quality...a restaurant right in Kenmore Square, just a few blocks away from the Tsai Performance Center.  They have a varied menu, dishes from mild to spicy and good prices.  I will be there by 5:30, with everyone's tickets!

484 Commonwealth Ave
Boston, MA 02215
Tel: 617 267 4499
http://www.indiaquality.com/

Easy access from the Green Line!

Here is a link with driving directions and parking info for the Tsai Center:
http://www.bu.edu/tsai/directions/

IF YOU ARE NOT MEETING US FOR DINNER, PLEASE LET ME KNOW SO I CAN ARRANGE FOR YOU TO GET YOUR TICKET!





This is a wonderful opera for a summer's evening...and the Tsai Performance Center is a smaller venue with great acoustics and good seating!

 

Donizetti’s domestic comedy Don Pasquale is an opera whose score bursts with life and lyricism and whose drama has a few surprises along the way, especially at Don Pasquale’s expense. Sparkling coloratura, lyrical arias and moments of dramatic insight come together in one of the world’s greatest operatic comedies.

Presented by Boston Midsummer Opera!  Our seats will be in the balcony.

You can read a synopsis of the story HERE!

 

 

 

PAYMENT INFO:
COST is $25 per person - including all fees
Please send $25 via PayPal to me using this email: julie.chilton@yahoo.com.

How to do this:
Log into your Paypal account.  Click the "Send Money" tab at the top.  Put my email address in the "To" box.  For "Amount" put 25.00.  Click the tab that says "Personal" and where it says "This money is being sent as" click on "payment owed."
item.how_to_find_us: Dinner before the show! - See below!
item.name: Don Pasquale! Summer Opera in Boston!
